name: Clark
text: Hello there! The name's Clark, I'm the clerk here!

name: Clark
text: I run this computer Shop, I'd love to help you find that stamp, but...

name: Clark
text: I'm a bit too busy to help right now, I'm missing a key.

name: Clark
text: I need a key, any key, if you give me one I'll let you look through the back for a stamp!
